name: StoneDAO
description: Stone Dao is designed by a disparate group of contributors, including developers within the Maker Foundation, its outside partners, and other persons and entities. It is the first decentralized finance (DeFi) application to see significant adoption. StoneDAO is essentially an open social experiment, based on gradually decentralized social evolution. StoneDAO provides a series of functional modules to make more communities become part of StoneDAO's organization,
